long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick way of accessing information filled in forms so that repetitive information can be easily accessible.

Once you install, go to any webpage and refresh the page.
You can then toggle the extension side-bar using Control + O.
Going forward, any text input you fill on the browser will be saved here.

All this information is saved locally on your computer and never shared with anyone.
